arts.ttl: West Ham United v Nottingham Forest: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Premier League updates from the 2.15pm BST kick-off Live scores | Table | Top scorers | And email Dominic There’s plenty else going on around the footballing world this fine Sunday. Catch the final moments of the last ever Everton men’s fixture at Goodison Park, or the early knockings of the Women’s FA Cup final. Or stick with me here, if you wish. Some stats: West Ham have won five of their six Premier League home games against Nottingham Forest, while Forest are seeking to complete their first league double over the Hammers since 1983/84. Continue reading...
